resources.string: アクセステストをします。完了したら、[確認]を押してください。コマンドが失敗した場合は、もう一度試してください。

You can manually grant Shortcutter access to Settings Secure, allowing more control over the system. 

From your PC go to www.leedroid.co.uk/SettingsSecureGuide & follow the instructions.

データ使用量情報の起動に失敗しました
Click Here for A guide to adding Quick Setting Tiles.\n\nOnce you have enabled your chosen tiles in the categories below, you need to add them to your pull-down in the system quick settings editor.
How To Add QS Tiles - Guide
1. Go to the Shortcutter \"Pull-Down\" tab & make your QS Tile selections.

2. Pull down your status bar & hit the edit button as seen below, this is usually a pen icon. 

 Samsung users hit the 3 dot menu & select rearrange.

 Your Shortcutter tiles will show in the bottom view.

3. In the Edit View you will find 2/3 containers, you will see your new Shortcutter tiles in the bottom container. \n\nTo add them, simply long press & drag your chosen tiles up to the top (Active) container & exit the Edit View.

IMPORTANT NOTE: 

 Due to a bug in Android N, you may struggle to add tiles, this can be worked around by doing the following. 

Remove any tiles you do not want in the "Pull-Down" tab & take your new tiles from the TOP of the available tiles container. 

Unfortunately this is not something I can fix as it has nothing to do with the app.

This feature is only available in the Premium version of Shortcutter.

Allows shortcutter to perform the following accessibility actions 

• Toggle Split Screen 
• Toggle Recent Apps 
• Show Power Menu 
• Expand Notifications & Quick Settings 
• Detect Activities - Required for Screen Filter & Screen Corners, these services will be stopped when apps are being installed & permissions are being granted.
Required to use the \"Lock Screen\" Quick Settings Tile
アクセシビリティのアクセス許可が必要
最近のアプリ画面を開きます

Shortcutter requires Accessibility access to toggle 

• Recent Apps 
• Power Menu 
• Split Screen 
• Detect Activities 
 - Required for Screen Filter & Screen Corners, these services will be stopped when apps are being installed & permissions are being granted. 

Click proceed, go to Shortcutter & enable the service.
Toggle Split Screen / Multi Window Mode

Shortcutter requires Admin privileges to:

 •Lock your device screen 

Please press proceed & enable Admin rights to use this Shortcut.

Several Shortcutter services require the Draw System Overlay permission to run, these include:
 
• Sidebar/Floating Toolbox 
• Screen Filter/Night Mode 
• Rounded Corners 
• Network Mode Dialogs 

Please click proceed & grant the required permission.

 • Detect secure activities. 

If a secure activity is detected, this overlay will automatically stop.

This toggle requires the ability to check network state.

 In order to do this the app needs the Phone permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This service requires the ability to access external storage.

 In order to do this the app needs the Read/Write Storage permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access the camera (Flash).

 In order to do this the app needs the Camera permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access your Sync settings.

 In order to do this the app needs the Read/Write Sync permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access your Location.

 In order to do this the app needs the Location permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.
インストールするショートカットを選択してください

これらはサービスを有効にするときに要求されます。
英語のアプリを実行する

Your device requires applications to be granted auto start permissions, Shortcutter background services will be killed if this is not enabled.\n\nPlease click Proceed & enable auto start for Shortcutter.

Shortcutter contains several background services, none of these services are power hungry or intensive, however in some instances, Android may kill these services when the device goes into deep sleep.

 To negate this issue I would recommend disabling Battery Optimisation for Shortcutter via Settings > Power.

I hope you enjoy the app!

To block notifications we need to enable a Notification Listener.\\n\\nThis listener will only listen for notifications from the android system, any notification containing \\\"running in the background\\\" will be removed.\\n\\n Please click proceed & enable Shortcutters Notification Blocker.

Shortcutter offers several different options to access an array of shortcuts, settings & services in an instant.

Via your Quick Settings Pull-Down 
 
• Add up to 95 additional Quick Settings Tiles! 
• Access shortcuts, toggles, tools & services from your pull-down panel.

The Shortcutter Sidebar/Floating Toolbox 
 
• Always on top and accessible. 
• Choose between a SideBar or a Floating Toolbox. 
• Open with a swipe or touch of the trigger. 
• Fully customisable layout, position & design. 
• Up to 106 different shortcuts, toggles, tools & services!

Launcher Shortcuts 
 
• Expose toggles your app drawer & home screen, enabling mapping to HTC Edge Sense, Second Displays, Tasker & much more! 
• Add up to 32 home screen shortcuts.

Launcher Shortcuts 

• Expose toggles your app drawer, enabling mapping to HTC Edge Sense, Second Displays, Tasker & much more! 
• Add up to 85 dynamic home screen shortcuts!.
Highlight tiles that have no active/inactive state as active.
This is an experimental setting, if any negative effects are seen, please toggle this switch back to its previous state.
A simple, always on top floating calculator
Limited to 10 launches in the FREE version
Backup all app data to your SD Card
